column2: Marks enemies to drop their soul on death
Right click to select which soul type the wand consumes
Consume a soul to fire a powerful explosive projectile
Right click to cycle which spell is cast from the tome
Right click to cycle which stat is upgraded, cast on the tome to upgrade
Increases the speed and damage of a projectile at the cost of a soul
Consumes a portion of your souls to increase the power of a projectile
